lead_paragraph: The actor Joshua Jackson reads an essay by Joshua Fattal, one of three American hikers held captive in Iran, about reuniting with his middle-school girlfriend after his release.

headline.main: The Modern Love Podcast: Between the Bars

snippet: The actor Joshua Jackson reads an essay by Joshua Fattal, one of three American hikers held captive in Iran, about reuniting with his middle-school girlfriend after his release.
